column5: My neighbor went to the RV show today and brought me a flyer on this. Be great for a small family or retired couple.http://www.hitchngorv.com/RV-Details.asp?stype=travel+trailer&VEHICLE_NO=445584&DEALER_NO=8182#.UtnVJxAo74Y
Lots of guys in the US Midwest with drop down shanty's. I'd rather have one of these though.  http://www.snobearcanada.com/
That's an awesome machine!  How many dollars would it take?
I'd hate to be in the snobear if it went through.. :s
it floats, might still be a scary experience though haha
